ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of MARTIN SULLIVAN of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2017.
